title: Blown Laptop Testing With Multimeter
message: I attached my apple logicboard to an alligator clip and a metal piece, I sent the black ground test lead of my muliteter to the metal sheet and once I placed my red multimeter lead to an inductor and ceramic capacitor the laptop motherboard zapped and has no power. How do you guys test the motherboard?

title: Blown Laptop Testing With Multimeter
message: Depends on what the meter was set to, V, A, diode. Also I do not understand what the metal piece is used for.
